apihelp-articlescores-summary: Allows actions to be taken for article scores
apihelp-articlescores-param-asaction: The article score action to invoke
apihelp-articlescores+getscores-param-pa: The page id of the article
apihelp-articlescores+setscore-param-pag: The page id of the article
apihelp-articlescores+setscore-param-met: The metric id of the score
apihelp-articlescores+setscore-param-sub: The submetric id of the score
